bots.author: CNN
bots.description: Recommends news stories that became personalized over time as it learns your interests.

bots.author: WSJ
bots.description: WSJ Messenger brings you breaking business news, investigative reporting and markets coverage from the award-winning WSJ newsroom.

bots.name: Poncho
bots.author: Poncho
bots.description: Personalized weather forecasts that will make you smile whatever the weather.

bots.name: Sequel Stories
bots.author: Sequel
bots.description: Choose your own adventure and discover romance, comedy, horror, and mystery!

bots.name: HP Print Bot
bots.author: HP
bots.description: The HP Print Bot allows users to easily print content directly from a Facebook Messenger conversation.

bots.author: Operator
bots.description: Operator is the easiest way to shop! Send us a text and our experts provide personalized recommendationsâ€”for free!

bots.name: Assist
bots.author: Assist
bots.description: No more searching, no need for an entire app. Assist brings the best services to your favorite messaging apps.

bots.name: Sure
bots.author: Sure
bots.description: Say 'Hi' on Facebook Messenger and instantly find businesses that match your values.

bots.name: Miss Piggy
bots.author: the Muppets
bots.description: Talk to Miss Piggy from the Muppets on Facebook Messenger!

bots.name: Detective Kees

bots.name: MemeMaker
bots.author: Harrison Shoebridge
bots.description: Create awesome macros on the fly, all you need is a picture and a line of text.

bots.name: JARVIS on Messenger
bots.author: Swapnil Agarwal
bots.description: Just A Rather Very Intelligent System, now on Messenger! JARVIS is a community-driven bot that aims to be as simple as possible to serve humans with their everyday tasks.

bots.name: Marina Alterra
bots.author: Alterra
bots.description: Marina Alterra is a virtual AI travel agent, a messenger bot (powered by algorithms, not humans). It helps travelers to discover where to go on vacation and book hotels there.

bots.name: Wally
bots.author: Mobile Media LLC
bots.description: Wally helps you get the most points from the credit cards you already have, and get the ones you need, to travel like a boss.
